00003 package ajc.data.pure;
00004 
00005 import ajc.*;
00006 import ajc.data.*;
00007 
00008 abstract class DataValueImpl extends DataImpl implements DataValue {
00009     protected DataValueImpl(PureFactory factory) {
00010         super(factory);
00011     }
00012     public DataValue first() throws Exceptional {
00013         return this;
00014     }
00015     public Data rest() {
00016         return factory.makeEmpty();
00017     }
00018 
00019     public List tupleToList() {
00020         return factory.makeList1(this);
00021     }
00022 
00023     public Data concat(Data data) {
00024         return factory.makeTuple(this, data);
00025     }
00026 
00027     public DataValue component(int n) throws Exceptional {
00028         if (n == 1)
00029             return this;
00030         throw new Exceptional(factory.makeEmpty());
00031     }
00032 
00033     /* Default equality to reference equality. 
00034      * This is enough for data values that  
00035      * have no real content (e.g. cell, agent, empty). */
00036 
00037     public Empty equals(Data data) throws Exceptional {
00038         if (this == data)
00039             return factory.makeEmpty();
00040         throw new Exceptional(factory.makeEmpty());
00041     }
00042 
00043 }
